answers.text:
You can contact our Flagstaff Sustainability Specialist, Stephanie Smith (928-213-2150).  We have a retrofit program (grant funded) that we have used for low income and others in our community, based on a sliding scale.

author: Amanda Stevens
text: Currently our housing department does not assist in reducing the energy cost burden on our low income clients.    How are other local governments reducing this burden (if at all) through the Housing Department.  I know social services will offer assistance at certain times of the year.
title: Reducing the energy cost burden on low income households
